<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Detective's Readiness](/Feats.aspx?ID=1457) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull. You gain your circumstance bonus from [Pursue a Lead](/Actions.aspx?ID=544) on saving throws (and their DCs, as normal) against the subject of a lead, and you can use [Clue In](/Actions.aspx?ID=545) to assist an ally's saving throw against that subject.
name: Detective's Readiness
